songs.title: Legs
songs.lyrics:
She's got legs
She knows how to use them
She never begs
She knows how to choose them
She's holdin' leg
Wonderin' how to feel them
Would you get behind them?
If you could only find them

She's my baby
She's my baby
Yeah, it's alright
It's alright
It's alright

She's got hair
Down to her fanny
She's kinda jet set
Try undo her panties
Every time she's dancin'
She knows what to do (what to do)
Everybody wants to see
To see if she can use it

She's so fine
She's all mine
Girl, you got it right
So right
You got it right (alright)

(Yeah)

She's got legs
She knows how to use them
She never begs
She knows how to choose them
She's got a dime
All of the time (all of the time)
Stays out at night movin'
Through time

Oh, I want her
So I got to have her
That girl's alright
She's alright
She's alright (right, right, right)
